backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping user-facing Valentine features to related source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including styles, components, hooks, and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color variables and dark-mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that imports global styles and renders ValentineLanding.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Celebr: Canvas‑based celebration effect with animated or static hearts depending on reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Inevit: Dynamic No button with evasive behaviors, cycling labels, pointer tracking, and reduced‑motion variants.
frontend/src/components/valentine/noButt: Defines a set of escalating evasive behavior functions for the 'No' button, each returning movement and style transformations based on pointer position and safe positioning logic.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Respon: Wrapper supplying live container bounds to children for positioning logic.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useCel: Provides a hook managing a timed celebration state, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/valentine/usePre: Implements a hook that tracks the user's system reduced‑motion preference via a media query listener.
frontend/src/components/valentine/useSaf: Generates safe random button positions within bounds, supporting edge, corner, and pointer‑repel behaviors while avoiding a reserved center area.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Main interaction flow with epilogue, question, and celebration states plus escalating teasing messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, Valentine‑themed color variables, gradients, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with Valentine color variables, extended themes, custom animations, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for a Valentine-themed interactive website, including its version, feature list, thematic requirements, and playful interaction rules. Contains architectural notes and existing features guiding UI behavior, visual design, and success/failure states.
